hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever buys a Muhaffalah, (1) he has the choice (of annulling the deal) for three days. If he returns it, then he must also give wheat equal to twice, the amount of its milk, or equal to the amount of its milk

chapter.eng-name: Sale of the Musarrah (animal whose udders were tied up)
